column4: the download mirors still have breezy ( and hoary and warty for that matter )

either will do ( w or who )
suppose a user is using two shells at the same time, it will show his name twice. the problem is i just need that name once.
do you understand what I did?
sort -u sorts by unique lines, the cut part cuts at the first field delimited by a space and discards the rest
the | pipes output to the following commands
cut -f1 -d" "  <-- only print the bit before the first space
then sort to only get uniques lines
